Articles.Content: Been playing kerbal for about a week and love it. Figured I would expand my experience by joning here.

Just replying. 

Been playing Kerbal for about 3 years and love it. Figured I would expand your experience by greeting you. ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
Hello hello. I've "only" been playing 2 years myself, but welcome to the forums!
